title: Le Bio d'Adam et Eve
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A healthier, ethical deli cafe and organic canteen. Offers organic fresh salads, sandwiches, soups, and warm dishes for grab-n-go; has a few tables for seating. Vegan choices include: tofu and hummus salad, seaweed salad, Indian tahini sandwich, soups, vegetable mixes, quinoa mixes, paella, vegetable croquette, spring rolls, fruit desserts, nut milk. Has a filtered water fountain. No Wi-Fi access.
